price: Kuma ba dõmin Allah Ya rubuta musu kõrar ba, dã Ya azabta su a cikin dũniya, kuma a Lãhira sunã da azãbar wutã.
arabic: وَلَوۡلَآ أَن كَتَبَ ٱللَّهُ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡجَلَآءَ لَعَذَّبَهُمۡ فِي ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ عَذَابُ ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: walawlā an kataba al-lahu ʿalayhimu al-jalāa laʿadhabahum fī al-dun'yā walahum fī al-ākhirati ʿadhābu al-nāri
